items.content_html: A lightweight, visually engaging Kanban board application built using Framer Motion, Next.js 14, Shadcn, and Tailwind CSS. This project was developed for learning purposes, focusing on creating a sleek and responsive task management tool.

items.content_html: CastelAPI is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify HTTP requests in web applications. It offers a clean and intuitive API for performing CRUD operations, handling loading states, caching responses, and managing retries.
items.title: Cast-El/CastelAPI: CastelAPI is a lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify HTTP requests in web applications. It offers a clean and intuitive API for performing CRUD operations, handling loading states, caching responses, and managing retries.

items.content_html: This project is a simple web application built using a frontend framework that displays random quotes with the click of a button. It allows users to explore various quotes and offers a refreshing and dynamic experience. The app is lightweight, easy to use, and a perfect example of how to integrate API data into a web project.
items.title: RedHatPixel/random-quote-generator: This project is a simple web application built using a frontend framework that displays random quotes with the click of a button. It allows users to explore various quotes and offers a refreshing and dynamic experience. The app is lightweight, easy to use, and a perfect example of how to integrate API data into a web project.
